member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.OngoingOperation
member.summary: The ongoing operation for event.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.OngoingOperation.DocumentLoading
member.summary: Document is being loaded.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.OngoingOperation.DocumentProcessing
member.summary: Document is being processed.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer
member.summary: Defines a base class for PDF renderers.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.ParsingErrorEventHandler
member.summary: Defines ParsingError event parameters.
member.param: Internal information about the parsing error.
Interruption flag. If true the renderer will throw an exception that interrupts the processing.

member.name: E:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.ParsingError
member.summary: Raised on PDF document parsing errors. This usually indicates a damaged document.
member.remarks: If this event is handled, and the abort in the event args was set to false, the renderer will skip the error and try to process the document further. Otherwise the renderer will throw an exception interrupting the processing.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.ProgressEventHandler
member.summary: Defines progress event parameters.
member.param: Ongoing operaration the progress reported from.
Interruption flag. Set it true to interrupt the processing.

member.name: E:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.ProgressChanged
member.summary: Raised for each reported progress value. Allows to cancel the processing.

member.name: E:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.PasswordRequired
member.summary: Occurs when the password required to decrypt the document.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.RegistrationName
member.summary: Registration name.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.RegistrationKey
member.summary: Registration key.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.Password
member.summary: PDF document owner password.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.Version
member.summary: Gets the component version number.

member.summary: Protected constructor.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the renderer class.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.BaseRenderer.Reset
member.summary: Resets the instance, disposes internal resources and releases the file. Use this method before loading another PDF file.

member.summary: Loads PDF document from specified file.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter
member.summary: DocumentPrinter class helps to send PDF document to a printer in silent mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Password
member.summary: Password for protected PDF documents.

member.name: E:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PasswordRequired
member.summary: Occurs when the password required to decrypt PDF document.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.RegistrationName
member.summary: Registration name.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.RegistrationKey
member.summary: Registration key.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Margins
member.summary: Gets or sets the margins for printed page.
member.value: A that represents the margins, in hundredths of an inch, for the page. The default is no margins on all sides because PDF documents usually contains margins already.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Landscape
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is printed in landscape or portrait orientation.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Copies
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.
member.remarks: Note: Not all printers support printing multiple copes.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Collate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Duplex
member.summary: Gets or sets the printer setting for double-sided printing.
member.remarks: Note: Not all printers support the duplex printing.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page should be printed in color.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PaperSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the paper size for the page.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PaperSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the page's paper source; for example, the printer's upper tray.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PrinterResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the printer resolution for the page.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.LoadDocumentFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads PDF document from specified file.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.LoadDocumentFromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads PDF document from provided stream.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PrintDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Prints all document pages to specified printer.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PrintDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Prints selected pages to specified printer.
member.param: Comma-separated list of page numbers in form "1-4,5,7,8-15,16-". Page numbers are 1-based. Ending "-" means "to the last page".

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PrintDocument(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints selected pages to specified printer.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.PrintDocument(System.String,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Prints selected pages to specified printer.

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.DocumentPrinter.SetMargins(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the margins for printed page in hundredths of an inch.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions
member.summary: Rendering options.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.TextSmoothingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the text smoothing mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.VectorSmoothingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the vector smoothing mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.ImageInterpolationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the image interpolation mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.RenderTextObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render text objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render text objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.RenderVectorObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render vector objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render vector objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.RenderImageObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render image objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render image objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.RenderCurveVectorObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render curve vector objects. True by default.
member.remarks: Use RenderCurveVectorObjects if you need to hide curves but keep straight lines. Use if you need to hide all vector drawings. property supersedes RenderCurveVectorObjects.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.PreferSystemFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to prefer fonts installed in system instead of fonts embedded into PDF document. Only fonts with identical names and font family will be substituted.
member.value: True if prefer system fonts; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.JPEGQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality of output JPEG images.
member.value: The integer that represents the quality of JPEG output images. From 0 (min size) to 100 (max quality). Default is 80.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.TIFFCompression
member.summary: Gets or sets the compression type of output TIFF images.
member.value: TIFF compression type.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.RotateFlipType
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of output image.
member.value: One of enumeration values.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.ImageBitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets or sets output images pixel format (bits per pixel).
member.value: One of enumeration values.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IRenderingOptions.OneBitConversionAlgorithm
member.summary: The algorithm to use for conversion to 1-bit (black and white) image.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IVectorRenderer

member.name: M:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.IVectorRenderer.GetMetafile(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Renders document page to .
member.param: Rendering resolution, in pixels per inch.
member.remarks: Pixel dimensions of the image will be calculated from PDF document Points (1/72") using the rendering resolution value.

member.remarks: Pixel dimensions of the image will be calculated from PDF document Points (1/72") using the rendering resolution value.

member.summary: Renders document page to .
member.param: Width of the output image in pixels. Use -1 to calculate the width from height keeping the aspect ratio.
Height of the output image in pixels. Use -1 to calculate the height from width keeping the aspect ratio.
member.remarks: Pixel dimensions of the image will be calculated from PDF document Points (1/72") using the rendering resolution value.

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType
member.summary: Specifies the direction of an image's rotation and the axis used to flip the image.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipNone
member.summary: Specifies no rotation and no flipping.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation without flipping.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation without flipping.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipXY
member.summary: Specifies no rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipNone
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation without flipping.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipX
member.summary: Specifies no rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipY
member.summary: Specifies no rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate90FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: F:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.summary: 8 bits per pixel.

member.summary: 24 bits per pixel.

member.summary: Use OTSU threshold algorithm

member.name: T:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions
member.summary: Rendering options.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.TextSmoothingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the text smoothing mode.
member.value: The text smoothing mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.VectorSmoothingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the vector smoothing mode.
member.value: The vector smoothing mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.ImageInterpolationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the image interpolation mode.
member.value: The image interpolation mode.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.RenderTextObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render text objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render text objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.RenderVectorObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render vector objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render vector objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.RenderImageObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render image objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render image objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.RenderCurveVectorObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render curve vector objects. True by default.
member.remarks: Use RenderCurveVectorObjects if you need to hide curves but keep straight lines. Use if you need to hide all vector drawings. property supersedes RenderCurveVectorObjects.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.PreferSystemFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to prefer fonts installed in system instead of fonts embedded into PDF document. Only fonts with identical names and font family will be substituted.
member.value: True if prefer system fonts; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.JPEGQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality of output JPEG images.
member.value: The integer that represents the quality of JPEG output images. From 0 (min size) to 100 (max quality). Default is 80.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.TIFFCompression
member.summary: Gets or sets the compression type of output TIFF images. Default is TIFFCompression.LZW.
member.value: TIFF compression type.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.RotateFlipType
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of output image. Default is RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipNone.
member.value: One of enumeration values.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.ImageBitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets or sets output images pixel format (bits per pixel). Default is 24 BPP.
member.value: One of enumeration values.

member.name: P:Bytescout.PDFRenderer.RenderingOptions.OneBitConversionAlgorithm
member.summary: The algorithm to use for conversion to 1-bit (black and white) image.
